changes: Refactored into thin orchestrator delegating to App.features.recoverySummary and App.features.recoveryTrends
Injected script tags for recovery summary/trends engines before report.render.recovery.js

removed_legacy_blocks.description: Inlined recovery state, cache, series builders, KPI update, insights, and Chart wiring were moved into App.features.recoveryTrends and App.features.recoverySummary engines.
removed_legacy_blocks.note: Legacy monolithic recovery render logic replaced by dedicated summary/trends engines.
